men.title: Hombres
men.description: Traje oscuro o azul marino, camisa clara y corbata opcional. Zapatos formales o mocasines elegantes.

reservedColors.description: Por favor evita estos colores para respetar el look del cortejo.

extras.title: Detalles extra
extras.description: Elegante, comodo y listo para fotos. Trae abrigo ligero por si refresca.

women.title: Mujeres
women.description: Vestido coctel o midi en tonos suaves. Evitar blanco, marfil, rose gold y dorado.

notice.title: Comodos y con estilo
notice.description: Queremos que te sientas comodo y que vengas a impresionar. Por favor sigue las guias y luce tu mejor version.

en.title: Dress code
en.note: We will share more information soon.

men.title: Men
men.description: Dark or navy suit, light shirt, and optional tie. Dress shoes or elegant loafers.

reservedColors.title: Reserved colors
reservedColors.description: Please avoid these colors to respect the wedding party look.
reservedColors.ariaLabel: View dress details for wedding party

extras.title: Extra details
extras.description: Elegant, comfortable, and photo ready. Bring a light coat in case it gets chilly.
extras.ariaLabel: View dress details for wedding party

women.title: Women
women.description: Cocktail or midi dress in soft tones. Avoid white, ivory, rose gold, and gold.

notice.title: Comfort meets style
notice.description: We want you to feel comfortable and dress to impress. Please follow the guidelines and look your best.
